Title: Software Change Classification using Hunk Metrics
Elements_risk_assessment:
We mark those hunks as bug introducing in which we find the source code involved
    in a bug fix.
UseOF-SZZ: To identify the bug introducing hunks, we identify first the bug introducing changes by using the SZZ algorithm
Summary: an approach for bug prediction at the smallest level of granularity.
Outcome:
The classification approach can classify hunks as buggy or bug free with 81 percent accu-
racy, 77 percent buggy hunk precision and 67 percent buggy hunk recall on average
